backend/main.mo: Motoko backend implementing access‑controlled user profiles, reviews, comments, reading tracker data, and reading metrics storage with create/read operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and tests for deployment verification.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files describing their purpose, styling, and component behavior.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_SMOKE_CHECK.md: Deployment checklist outlining pre‑publish checks, post‑publication verification steps, navigation tests, authentication flow, and core feature smoke tests.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme configuration defining OKLCH color tokens, dark mode variables, and global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing root mount node and script loading React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup defining all core routes and including layout and profile modal, plus dev‑mode route verification.
frontend/src/components/CopyAppLinkContr: UI control that copies the app’s URL using the Clipboard API with fallback dialog when copy fails.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Defines the main app layout with header, navigation (desktop and mobile), footer, and renders children content.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Provides login/logout handling with Internet Identity, including error handling and status display.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Displays a modal prompting new authenticated users to enter and save their name.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useCallerUserPro: Fetches the authenticated user's profile using the actor and exposes loading and fetched state.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useSaveCallerUse: Saves the user's profile via mutation and invalidates the profile query on success.
frontend/src/hooks/reviews/useComments.t: Fetches comments for a given review using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/reviews/useLatestRevi: Retrieves the latest reviews up to a specified limit.
frontend/src/hooks/reviews/useReview.ts: Fetches a single review by ID.
frontend/src/hooks/reviews/useReviewMuta: Provides mutations for adding reviews, liking/unliking, and adding comments with related query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/tracker/useReadingMet: Fetches authenticated user's reading metrics from the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/tracker/useTrackedBoo: Gets the user's tracked books list when authenticated.
frontend/src/hooks/tracker/useTrackerMut: Provides mutations for managing tracked books and reading progress with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an actor instance based on identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, logout, stored identity loading, and auth-client creation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes, along with global body and border styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/ReaderDashboardPage.t: Displays a user's reading statistics and tracked books, showing metrics and progress when authenticated.
frontend/src/pages/ReadingTrackerPage.ts: Allows authenticated users to manage tracked books, update progress and metrics, and add or remove entries.
frontend/src/pages/ReviewDetailPage.tsx: Shows a detailed view of a single review with likes, comments, and metadata, supporting interactions when authenticated.
frontend/src/pages/ReviewsFeedPage.tsx: Displays a feed of recent reviews and provides an authenticated form for creating new reviews.
frontend/src/utils/appLink.ts: Provides helpers to safely access the app's current origin or full URL in browser contexts.
frontend/src/utils/buildInfo.ts: Provides build metadata utilities that read version and timestamp from environment variables with fallbacks and generate a short build identifier.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Formats bigint timestamps into relative time strings or a short date when older than a week.
frontend/src/utils/internetIdentityConfi: Computes Internet Identity provider and derivation origin based on environment, with fallbacks for local and production deployments.
frontend/src/utils/referral.ts: Generates a UTM content value from the current hostname or a fallback string when unavailable.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and manipulating hash‑based params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, layout, animations, and theme utilities for the frontend.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, features, issues, and metadata for the book review platform.
